column4: hello . i installed with the synaptik the mysqp-server and client and now when i try to do something with it ..the programs say that "There seems to be a problem with the MySQL server, sorry for the inconvenience. "

you just install it?
ok, you setup sql with dbase and users yet?

why cant you edit it?
you edit the file with a text editor on the machine
you cant edit a file through a web browser
gedit or nano the file on your computer
it askes me root password , but on ubunt , it will cant login becase root mode is disable it can only login as root with sudo su
you will probably need to have created a database and users with the correct rights etc in mysql. You might whant to find phpmysql to do that for you.
